name: swipecut
description: SwipeCut - Video splitting and Tinder-style UI for video editing

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
